title: Help: Japanese text in adobe software
content:
hello  
i have a problem with writing in japanese.  
i have windows xp and already checked : Install files for East Asian languages in Regional and Language Options in control panel and in language option, in settings i added the japanese option.

also i downloaded microsoft global IME for offcie xp,,,(i didn't find non office for xp.)  
and..downloaded the microsoft japanese language support.

and with all this done i still cant write in japanese in illustrator or any other  
adobe sowftware.

can anybody help me?

thanks in advance
author: pimentel

comments.content:
Start\>Control Panel\>Date, Time, Language and Regional Options\>Regional & Language Options\>Languages\>Details\>Settings\>Installed Services\>Add\>Japanese

whew! i hope that helps.
